short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Maximize large screen displays using rotating chrome tabs to display your most important information. Highly configurable.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Maximize large screen displays using rotating chrome tabs to display your most important information. Highly configurable.

This extension supports variable display times for primary and secondary tabs which allows for you to have some tabs with the most important data display longer than other tabs. The number of primary tabs is configurable.

This extension works with multiple chrome windows and can be configured to work with all open windows, only the focused window, or only the background windows.

Finally, this extension supports specifying a refresh time for how often to refresh primary and secondary tabs.
